ClassDesc: Convenient functionalities for "callable" data. Note that, this is NOT a separate data kind. This URI allows the ContactsProvider to return a unified result for "callable" data that users can use for calling purposes. @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#CommonDataKinds#Phone_E@ and @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#CommonDataKinds#SipAddress_E@ are the current examples for "callable", but may be expanded to the other types. Each returned row may have a different MIMETYPE and thus different interpretation for each column. For example the meaning for @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#CommonDataKinds#Phone_E@'s type is different than @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#CommonDataKinds#SipAddress_E@'s.
